ygData.subject: Re: Looking for item
ygData.msgSnippet: Heya Girlfriend!!!! I found out that you hold it in your hand to boost your charisma when you sell items.  Pretty neat, eh?  Have had a bunch of folks want to
ygData.messageBody:
Heya Girlfriend!!!!

I found out that you hold it in your hand to boost your charisma when
you sell items. Pretty neat, eh? Have had a bunch of folks want to buy it,
but now that I know what it does, I ain't selling!! And thanks for telling
me where it came from....I HATE that Bouncer Hurd...glad I got one of his
items!

Cya in SolB or Cazic, Tao!!! <big hugs>

Mik
-----Original Message-----
From: Taoism <tca@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, June 13, 1999 1:31 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Looking for item


>From: "Taoism" <tca@...>
>
>Hiya Mik,
>
>>From my knowledge the crude stein comes from the zone into Cazic Thule
>area's favourite menace, Bouncer Hurd. He drops it from what I have been
>told. That's all I know.
>
>
>Taoism Wyndfist
>The Rathe.
>
